Advances the iterator by calling {{c|sbuf_-&gt;sbumpc()}} where {{tt|sbuf_}} is the stored pointer to the stream buffer.

The behavior is undefined if the iterator is end-of-stream iterator.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|*this}}

@2@ A {{tt|proxy}} object holding the current character obtained via {{lc|operator*()}} and the {{tt|sbuf_}} pointer. Dereferencing a {{tt|proxy}} object with {{tt|operator*}} yields the stored character.

@@ The name {{tt|proxy}} is for exposition only.
